name: 3 Bundle Deal & Lace Closure BRZL BODY WAVE (ONLY)
description:
Loyalty Luxe is proud to introduce our Brazilian Collection 3Bundle Deal & Lace Closure Brazilian Hair is one of the most popular types of Virgin hair extensions out on the market. Brazilian hair naturally blends well with many hair types including African-American, Hispanic, and Caucasian. It is good for all hairstyles, holds curls beautifully and curls when wet. Our Virgin Brazilian Hair is collected from single donor and has not been chemically treated or processed in any way. 
Our Bundle Deal w/Lace Closures only comes in one Orgin and texture: Brazilian Body Wave. This closure is available in Lace Middle Part Loyalty Luxe closures are 100% virgin human hair. Available in 4x4 12"-18"



Product Code:BLBW39

-3.5-3.7oz each bundle
-Comes from one donor
-100% unprocessed virgin hair
-Sealed wefts
-Very minimal shedding
-Machine-made wefts
-Tangle free
-Healthy shine low to medium luster
-All cuticles are in the same direction
-All hair comes in natural colors ( #1B )

Note: 2-3 bundles are needed for a full head of hair depending on the length and desired volume

name: Caffiene Cream
description:
This Caffeine based cream is able to define a perfect silhouette in a short period of time, achieving the appearance of a flat tummy and a slim figure, free of stretchmarks and fat deposits (cellulite)

Apply to stomach after shower and put on thermal waist trainer for maximum osmotic results. You can also apply and wrap area with saran wrap for same results. suggested for areas like upper thighs and upper arms.

name: The Python Waist Trainer- Latex Black/or Leopard Print
description:
The Python Waist Trainer is our latest addition to the Loyalty Luxe Brand. Ladies get your waistline back or keep it in check with our top of the line waist cincher. The Python is designed in Columbia by plastic surgeons who specialize in body sculpting and positioning of  fat cells to proportion the body and accentuate curves. The Python can be worn under clothes very seamlessly. 
Sizes are: XS-3XL (32-44 waist)
-Correct Posture 
-Molds Waist Line and Abdomen
-Double Prongs For Adjustment When You Lose Inches
-Maximum Support Designed To Hold You In All Day
-Promotes Control in Over Eating
-Available in Nude and Black

WE DO NOT ISSUE REFUNDS ON GARMENTS. PLEASE VIEW THE SIZING CHART TO ENSURE YOU CHOOSE THE RIGHT SIZE.

name: Ombre Hair Coloring Services
description:
The hair world borrowed the term 'Ombre' from the french word meaning shaded or shading. Ombre hair color is generally darker at the roots through the mid-shaft and then gradually gets lighter from the mid-shaft to the ends. It is usually achieved using a balayage technique and is ideal for clients looking for a low-maintenance style. 

PLEASE NOTE THAT COLORING SERVICES ADD AN ADDITIONAL DAY TO SHIPPING. Please see our shipping policy 

There are no exchanges or refunds on custom colored hair. 
Product Code: OM250
